Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Deconstructing the DECLARE Model Activities A Receive Application B Preliminary Credit Check C Gather Additional Documents D Assemble Loan Offer Package E Quality Assurance Review F Authorize Contract Terms G Transfer Funds H Notify Customer Z Proceed Without Compliance Constraints existence A C absence Z exactly one B init A

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Mapping the flow Init A Response A to B Succession B to C AltSuccession C to E Coexistence C to F ChainSuccession E to D Precedence E to F ChainPrecedence F to B deriving sequence A to B to C and potential loops

Name: Deductive Reasoning - NE
Text: Identifying conflicts Succession B to C vs ChainPrecedence F requires B immediate before F creating impossibility since B followed by C not F ExactlyOne B vs cycle F to B to C to F via Coexistence

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Self Correction on chainprecedence definition Structure chainprecedence Authorize Contract Terms target Preliminary Credit Check meaning Authorize requires Credit Check immediately before Revisiting semantic differences in DECLARE templates

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Hypothesis model has logical conflicts but interpret as intent for real life controls QA loop E to D to E via ChainSuccession and responded existence Noncoexistence G and A as temporal separation or phase segregation

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Inferring best explanation constraints illustrate types even if contradictory focus on business meanings like preventing loops segregation of duties iterative refinement rather than proving unsatisfiability

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Generalizing to business goals Compliance via absence Z quality via QA loop efficiency via ExactlyOne B risk management via noncoexistence segregation customer experience via succession and notifications

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Strategic approach Do not say model broken instead creatively interpret conflicts as strict controls gloss over logical issues to provide practical narrative on real life scenario

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Refining interpretations ChainSuccession E to D as fix and recheck loop Precedence E to F as QA before authorize Noncoexistence as safety segregation fitting regulatory context

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Planning narrative structure Foundation compliance workflow phases quality loop authorization logic payout phase interplay for business regulatory goals
